assessment_criteria.name: Considerate behaviour
assessment_criteria.description: The project has a policy or code of practice regarding considerate behaviour by construction companies and the policy has been communicated to all appropriate people working on the project and embedded in the project's management system.

sub_credits.description: Communicated to all appropriate people working on the project.
Embedded in the project's management system.

assessment_criteria.name: Independent assessment of considerate behaviour
assessment_criteria.description: The implementation of the project's policy or code of practice regarding considerate behaviour has been independently assessed and judged to be at least satisfactory.

assessment_criteria.name: Visual impact during construction
assessment_criteria.description: Measures have been taken to minimise the adverse visual impact of the site during the construction stage.
